column7: The following statement contains a magic number: number = 20;
The following statement contains a magic number: for (int i = 0; i < array.Length; i++) {  	if (i % 10 == 0) {  		if (array [i] == number) {  			return true;  		}  	}  }
The following statement contains a magic number: if (i % 10 == 0) {  	if (array [i] == number) {  		return true;  	}  }
